name: v0.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* [Docs] add some case by @yanfeng-li in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/116
* Fix transformers extra [torch] by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/121
* Release v0.2.1 by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/124


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* [Raadme] fix image not found by @yanfeng-li in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/37
* [Docs] solve some error by @yanfeng-li in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/39
* 35 streamlit built in support by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/41
* [Docs] update home index by @yanfeng-li in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/51
* update mkdocs nav translation by @yanfeng-li in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/49
* Fix docs disappers by @yanfeng-li in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/54
* add theme-flattop by @oufl in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/40
* Linguist Ignore CSS, JS and HTML by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/56
* Add more e2e tests by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/52
* Update repo link in index.zh.md by @HaveF in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/60
* Adjust Documentation Structure by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/64
* Update Documentation for v0.2.0 by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/59
* 33 support custom request model and display custom api in swagger UI by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/65
* Use Mike for Multi Version Documentation by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/70
* Fix documentation some error by @oufl in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/72
* Support Direct Function Registration with Decorator by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/71
* Fix api docs css 404 by @oufl in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/74
* 66 documentation use python3 type hint to provide request and response schema for your model by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/76
* Frontend Mode: App is the Backend URL Address by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/77
* Documentation: Add CLI Doc by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/78
* Update Frontend Requirements Documentation by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/80
* Tools: Convert Between PIL Image and Base64 String by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/83
* Fix static file missing bug by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/88
* Improve E2E Tests by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/89
* Add API Tests by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/91
* 69 example dockerfile by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/90
* 98 add backend test script and e2e test script using docker by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/100
* Add Starting Logs by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/102
* Integrate Streamlit; Test Script for pypi Release; by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/103
* 104 update tutorial documentation with frontend by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/105
* Update HuggingFace Vision Example by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/106
* 107 if type hint not provided print a warning in frontend by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/108
* 47 documentation frontend task type and template and how to add custom task and template by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/111
* Documentation: How To Custom Frontend Page by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/112
* Release v0.2.0 by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/114

## New Contributors
* @yanfeng-li made their first contribution in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/37
* @oufl made their first contribution in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/40
* @HaveF made their first contribution in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/60

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Create a Pull Request Template by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/19
* Hugging Face Example by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/22
* Hugging Face Pipeline Vision Example by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/24
* Update docs by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/26
* Add Chinese Readme by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/30
* Provide sklearn joblib pytorch and tensorflow handlers by @wjiuhe in https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/pull/27


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/underneathall/pinferencia/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1
